verses.name: Jeremiah 33:17
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord; David shall never want a man to sit upon the throne of the house of Israel;

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:18
verses.text: Neither shall the priests the Levites want a man before me to offer burnt offerings, and to kindle meat offerings, and to do sacrifice continually.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:19
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:20
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; If ye can break my covenant of the day, and my covenant of the night, and that there should not be day and night in their season;
